an5.221:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, adinava dighacarikam anavatthacarikam anuyuttassa viharato.
an5.221:1.3: Assutam na sunati, sutam na pariyodapeti, sutenekaccena avisarado hoti, galham rogatankam phusati, na ca mittava hoti.
an5.221:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava dighacarikam anavatthacarikam anuyuttassa viharato.
an5.221:2.3: Assutam sunati, sutam pariyodapeti, sutenekaccena visarado hoti, na galham rogatankam phusati, mittava ca hoti.
an5.221:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca anisamsa samavatthacare”ti.
